resources.string: IIU Test app for Android Wear

This is a proof of concept app that packages an Android Wear app with it. The Android Wear version of this app displays a condensed version of the STD Tx Guide condition list with one treatment regimen built in (Cervicitis). Swiping right from the Cervicitis treatment regimen reveals an \'Open on phone\' option. Clicking \'Open on phone\' launches the handheld app directly to the Cervicitis condition details page. The other conditions in the wearable app launch dummy sublists to emulate choosing a condition which contains subconditions. At this time, no additional functionality is built into those conditions. The button below also works to navigate the handheld app to the Cervicitis condition details page.
